009package Tools;
010
011/**
012 * Closes all open images except the currently active image. 
013 * Much copied from from ij.plugin.WindowOrganizer.java
014 * 
015 * @author WB
016 * @version 2012/02/15
017 */
018import ij.ImagePlus;
019import ij.WindowManager;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
022import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
023
024public class Close_Other_Images implements PlugInFilter {
025        
026        ImagePlus im;
027        
028        @Override
029        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
030                this.im = im;
031                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
032        }
033        
034        @Override
035        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
036                int[] winIds = WindowManager.getIDList();
037                if (winIds == null || winIds.length < 1) {
038                        return;
039                }
040                
041                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog("Close all images");
042                dlg.addCheckbox("Close current image too?", false);
043                dlg.showDialog();
044                if (dlg.wasCanceled()) {
045                        return;
046                }
047                
048                boolean closeCurrentImage = dlg.getNextBoolean();
049                int thisId = this.im.getID();
050                
051                for (int id : winIds) {
052                        if (id != thisId || closeCurrentImage) {
053                                ImagePlus imp = WindowManager.getImage(id);
054                                if (imp != null) {
055                                        imp.close();
056                                }
057                        }
058                }
059        }
060}
061
